name: Humanoid Huntress
description: You have been summoned to this mysterious world by inhabitants of unknown origins to search for the obsidian stone of truth. It is the only thing that can save life as a whole for these mysterious creatures that roam this land. Meet strange looking inhabitants who will guide you on your path. A mixture of Humanoid and Zombie like creatures await you on your journey as you travel around this huge world looking for what is called the obsidian stone of truth.
